http://www.tccsa.tc/adventure/fair_ideas.html
 
 This is beautiful. Some of my favorites.
 
 
4. Statistical occurrence of giants, and midgets and dwarfs and giantism. Use Princess Flo, Goliath, and brothers.

 
10. What was life like before the Flood?

 
19. Can a dog run a maze faster than a gerbil?

 
35. Why does the Bible say there is one glory of the sun, one glory of the moon, and one glory of the stars?

 
36. Why is snow 6 sided?

 and finally...

I'm afraid they're serious. The fact they actually go fossil hunting, and extract fossils, yet don't believe in evolution is odd. I mean I know the creationist 'reasoning' for how fossils could occur, but I didn't thik any creationists were actually out there digging. Blind leading the blind if you ask me....
